name: Bodega
description:
"Let's run through this hypothetical situation."

It's another uneventful day in your uptown bodega, manning the register, mopping the floor, shooting the breeze with the locals; same deal as always. Or is it? When an innocent inquiry leads you to catch a kid shoplifting, your actions exemplify patience and understanding through your interactions with the boy.

In this short side-scrolling narrative, we present an unconventional view of justice—and how small acts of humanity can make a world of difference.

NOTE: When the game starts up, you have to interact with the three objects in the store and have the conversation with the other customer before having a conversation with the boy, or else the narrative will not progress correctly.
